# coding: utf-8

n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    if h[i] > 0:
        ans += 1
        for j in range(i+1, n):
            if h[j] > 0:
                h[j] -= 1

print(ans)

N = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))
cnt = 0
for i in range(N):
    if h[i] > cnt:
        cnt = h[i]
print(cnt)

a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(a+b)

N = int(input())
h = list(map(int,input().split()))

cnt = 1
for i in range(1,N):
    if h[i] < h[i-1]:
        cnt += 1
print(cnt-1)


n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = a[0]
for i in range(n):
    if a[i] > a[i-1]:
        ans += a[i] - a[i-1]
    else:
        ans += a[i-1] - a[i]

print(ans)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
a.sort()
for i in range(n):
    if i == n-1:
        print(a[i])
    else:
        print(a[i], end=' ')

n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    if h[i] > 0:
        ans += 1
        for j in range(i + 1, n):
            if h[j] > 0:
                h[j] -= 1

print(ans)
